page.title: 13THE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: THE VILLAGE HALL BELONGS TO THE WHOLE VILLAGE. THE MAIN SOCIAL EVENTS ARE HELD HERE. THERE ARE DANCES, BINGO, CONCERTS, PANTOMIMES AND FUND RAISING EVENTS. THE LOCAL DRAMA GROUP HAVE THEIR REHEARSALS HERE, THE SENIOR CITIZENS HAVE A LUNCH ONCE A WEEK, THE DOCTOR HOLDS HIS SURGERY HERE ONCE A WEEK, THE SCHOOL USES IT AND IT IS AVAILABLE FOR HIRE FOR PRIVATE PARTIES. EVERY SUMMER THERE IS A PLAY SCHEME FOR THE LOCAL CHILDREN, FINANCED BY THE LOCAL DISTRICT COUNCIL, BUT HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL. WITHOUT SUCH A MEETING PLACE THE COMMUNITY LIFE OF A SMALL VILLAGE WOULD SUFFER. THERE HAS BEEN ONE BREAK-IN. WASHING- UP LIQUID WAS SQUIRTED ON THE FLOOR TO MAKE A SLIDE, BUT NO GREAT DAMAGE WAS DONE.
